data.message: Why MUST we get messenger? Why can't we just message as we choose? I don't need you data mining me 24/7. I don't need to be connected to soulless subhumans 24/7. I really just want to trade chickens to strangers near me.

replies.message: Hi James. Messenger is a better messaging experience - with added speed and new features - like the groups tab, the ability to make voice calls and easy new ways to take and send photos and videos within the app. Plus, it links seamlessly with the Facebook app to make switching between the two quick and easy! Learn more: http://bit.ly/2foPsGD. -Joe

Facebook please verify my account as I had uploaded my identity card for verifying my identity and now I want you to verify my profile as it deactivates time and again due to reporting of some pigheaded people who wrongly report my profile to Facebook and Facebook deactivate my profile..... I request to please officially verify my Id and make me free of this problem of deactivation without any reason.

Thanks
No one likes messenger.  Get over it Facebook
If it were better, you wouldn't have to force anyone. I am simply asking to not be forced to do anything.

No, it's not better. It was better when it didn't have garbage features that you can't disable and it and Facebook were just one simple app. It's stupid, and literally no one appreciates the nonsense it entails.
Did you see their response? "It's for your own good" is what I'm reading.
This move is going to cause an alternate social site or two to rise up. Get rid of this! You are worse than apple and Google with this insistence!  You catch more flies with sugar than with vinegar.

I use the browser for messages. There's a trick to it. Go to your mobile browsers settings and look for an option called "request desktop site" - or something to that effect. Your Facebook page will reload and you can access your messages without installing anything.
No. I don't like messenger. I refuse to download it! Takes up helluva lot of space.
what if i don't want it
( تازہ ترین خبروں سے بروقت باخبر رہنے کیلئے پیج لائیک کریں )                                                             facebook.com/Pak-Taiz-News-803064769803445/
